publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2440 Angus MacKay: Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill: Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-2440 Angus MacKay: Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock
